revision.text: {{Talk header}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPMILHIST|class=Start|B1=no|B2=yes|B3=yes|B4=yes|B5=yes|Aviation=yes|US=yes}} {{WikiProject Aviation|class=c|Aircraft-project=yes |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes }} }} == this entire article is plagiarized == This entire article is plagiarized, nearly word for word, from pp74-76 of jones, us fighters army air force 1925 to 1980s , aero publishers inc. While a few things have been added, the core plagarism is very clear. The article should be deleted and rewritten in a non infringing way. â€” Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/86.26.12.110|86.26.12.110]] ([[User talk:86.26.12.110|talk]]) 02:00, 4 March 2012 (UTC) :Are you sure? I cannot see any plagarism or close paraphase myself.[[User:Nigel Ish|Nigel Ish]] ([[User talk:Nigel Ish|talk]]) 17:36, 4 March 2012 (UTC) ::I've started a discussion of this [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia_talk:WikiProject_Aircraft#Claims_of_plagarism_on_Talk:Consolidated_P-30 here].[[User:Nigel Ish|Nigel Ish]] ([[User talk:Nigel Ish|talk]]) 17:43, 4 March 2012 (UTC) Yes, I'm quite sure, and so sure that I'm wondering if you're looking at the same book. I dont have the book in front of me here, but I was referring to a copy that I believe to be from the 1970s (perhaps there have been revision)? I read about the P-30 there then went to wiki for additional info and was surprised to find the very very very close similarity, including entire sentences and multi-sentence segments lifted wholesale from the book and/or provided with trivial modifications. If you'd like, I can find the book and scan it. I haven't looked at other aircraft and so it's probably not right for me to speculate, but I kind of suspect we'd find many other examples of this for other older aircraft. Amazingly, Jones is not even cited in the references, which hints at a deliberate attempt at obfuscation. (I assume Jones is a primary source here). [[Special:Contributions/86.26.12.110|86.26.12.110]] ([[User talk:86.26.12.110|talk]]) 10:03, 7 March 2012 (UTC)
